headline: Disney debuts new Treasure cruise ship: What to know
summary: Disney (DIS) unveils its newest cruise ship, the Disney Treasure, as part of the company's plans to double its fleet capacity by 2031. Yahoo Finance's Alexandra Canal joins Brad Smith on Wealth to report back on her visit to the new cruise ship, detailing how much a trip on the vessel would cost and the onboard experiences included in the trip package. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.

headline: Comcast is offloading its cable properties. Other media companies could do the same.
summary: Comcast is offloading most of its cable properties in a move that signals more industry M&A to come.

headline: Fox and Hulu announce multi-year content streaming partnership
summary: Under the terms of the new agreement, Fox's prime-time entertainment programming — including "The Masked Singer", "The Simpsons", and "Family Guy" — will continue to stream on Hulu a day after the telecast.  "Our collective marketing efforts, which will continue with this new deal, have generated impressive results and helped viewers successfully find the shows they want to watch, when they want to watch them," said Lauren Tempest, general manager at Hulu.
